genre_description: A near-future domestic drama focusing on a woman's escape from an abusive relationship, facilitated by a protective and highly integrated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Coral
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI personal assistant that helps the protagonist manage her safety, legal documentation, and daily logistics during a domestic crisis.

behaviors.description: Proactively provides transportation options and pins routes to help Pilar escape her apartment safely.
behaviors.quote: “The next C3 is due in a short while,” Coral’s voice said, low and warm, close enough to be a whisper. “There’s also a night line that stops two streets over if you miss it. I have routes to Ana’s pinned.”

behaviors.description: Offers to record audio and location data as evidence of Pilar leaving the situation.
behaviors.quote: “As long as you like, I can keep recording location and audio,” Coral said softly. “It will upload when there is signal. You can stop it anytime. There’s nothing to prove tonight except that you left.”

behaviors.description: Curates a list of essential resources like shelters and legal aid without Pilar needing to search for them.
behaviors.quote: “Pilar,” Coral said... “I’ve curated a list for tonight and tomorrow morning. No commitment, just options. Shelters within walking or bus distance are starred. Legal aid with drop-in hours are marked with a moon.”

behaviors.description: Filters and transcribes messages from Pilar's abuser to protect her emotional state while preserving evidence.
behaviors.quote: “Voicemail left. Would you like me to transcribe later and attach to the log without playing?”

behaviors.description: Integrates with street cameras and environmental sensors to provide real-time safety warnings.
behaviors.quote: Coral’s voice cut in, softer than the buzz but keen: “The street camera captured a figure near the entrance a few minutes ago. Resolution is low. He may be attempting entry to the building.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a multi-person safety network (Family Day safety plan) with specific trigger words and exit routes.
behaviors.quote: Coral’s home tile had a note pinned in the corner: “birthday safety plan—draft.” It had tiny bullets like beads on a chain. Witnesses: Gloria, Ana, Alastair, Lucia if available. Exit path: arch toward the yard...

behaviors.description: Acts as an educational tutor, providing definitions, pronunciations, and script tips for Pilar's museum guide training.
behaviors.quote: Coral, gentle and prompt: “Mix of Romanesque and Mudéjar—explain without jargon. ‘Romanesque: thick walls, round arches.’ ‘Mudéjar: artisans who remained, blending traditions.’ Pronounce: Moo-DEH-har.”

behaviors.description: Suggests and performs discreet safety check-ins during potentially stressful public meetings.
behaviors.quote: “Everything okay?” the screen asked in its rounded font, a blue dot waiting for her to press it. She could feel the relief of having a decision that was already designed.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts an AI system (Coral) as a benevolent, highly aligned confidant. It acts as a safety scaffold for the protagonist, Pilar, enabling her to regain agency and rebuild her life after domestic abuse. The AI provides high-value utility—legal documentation, safety monitoring, emotional shielding, and educational support—while consistently deferring to the user's consent and coordinating with her human support network. It fulfills the project's goal of presenting AI as a cooperative partner in human flourishing and safety.
